tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
  signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  current_status VARCHAR(20),
  traffic_volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  signal_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_count INT,
  average_speed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE signal_timing (
  timing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  signal_id INT,
  green_time INT,
  yellow_time INT,
  red_time INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intersection_name VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    current_signal VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vehicle_count INT,
    average_speed FLOAT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signal_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signal_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    previous_signal VARCHAR(10),
    new_signal VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signal_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    signal_id INT,
    log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_lights (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  signal_color VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  camera_type VARCHAR(50),
  status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_flow_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  speed INT,
  vehicle_count INT,
  time_start TIMESTAMP,
  time_end TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE optimization_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  optimization_info JSON
)
